author: tefera
title: Lobby Ethiopia
description: Ethiopia is the flagship project for Cardano, with notable successes. but also setbacks
solution: IOG deals with top officials. Once people come to the top, have very little appetite 4 change, necessitating a need for push from bottom up.
experience: Opensource localisation initiator, coordinator and translator. Community organizer. Run ITN, Catalyst member since Fund1, CA, vCA
